posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Hail, ECBers,

I come to you now with the beautiful but arrogant Sharwyn. In the OC, she was a selfish, shallow and very good-looking woman whose only concern was to become famous. She was a Bard / Fighter in HoTU, and if you've ever played there just for fun with a lvl 40 toon, I did just to see the Henchmen's final builds, she was a Bard 20 / Fighter 20. Let's be honest, that's a very gimped build already. I tried to stay faithful to her story, but to me she was always a Bard first and a Fighter second. Third, she is just the kind of person that would join the harpers just for the status, to feel important and like a part of something bigger than herself, so I made her a Harper scout, which powergaming-wise allowed me to get 2 Great CHA feats in exchange for Alertness and Iron Will in pre-epics, not to mention a stacking cat's grace and the ability to craft potions. All in all, she's a resourceful combatant with many tools: Lasting Inspiration, a full Bard Song and Curse Song, near indispellability, EWS in her Two-bladed Sword and 6 attacks per round (7 if hasted).

My dear ECBers, please welcome the fair Sharwyn into our halls!
